page.title: 06HOME LIFE_ NINE YEAR OLD BOY
page.content: "Drrrring", my alarm goes off. "Yahoo, it's Sunday", I shout. I read for 1/2 an hour. I get up and have breakfast. I go into my Mum's room. I say,"May I go out, please ?" " Yes" she says. So I run down the pavement. I call for Benjamen. We go down to the park. Firstly, we go on the swings, then on the roundabout. We get it going really fast, then we try to jump on. We get off and go on the slide a few times. Then we go off up Wilton Estate. We go to see the cows. We stay up there for about 1/2 an hour. Then we walk through the cricket field down Doctor's Lane. We meet some more friends like Steven Hanks and Martin.
